mapper.select: SELECT sys_id, date_from, time_from, time_to, doctor_nurse_no, service_method, is_active, state FROM sys_doctor_nurse_schedule where doctor_nurse_no = #{doctorNo} and date_format(date_from,'%Y-%m')=date_format(#{dateFrom},'%Y-%m')

SELECT ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,ub.date_of_birth,CURDATE()) as age,-- 年龄 om.total_qty,-- 人数 eha.appoint_date,-- 预约时间 eha.address,-- 预约地址 eha.status ,-- 待服务0 euha.is_submitted -- 待评估状态 FROM entity_healthy_appointment as eha LEFT JOIN order_main as om ON om.order_no=eha.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_user_healthy_appraisal as euha ON euha.order_no=eha.order_no LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=eha.user_id where eha.related_no=#{params.doctorNo} and date_format(eha.appoint_date,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{params.appointDate} and eha.pkg_main_id=8 and eha.pkg_detail_id=803

SELECT ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,ub.date_of_birth,CURDATE()) as age,-- 年龄 ub.cellphone_no,-- 电话 sdno.appoint_date, -- 预约时间 sdno.is_confirmed -- 是否确认 0:未确认 1:已确认 from sys_doctor_nurse_oppointment as sdno LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=sdno.user_id where doctor_nurse_no=#{params.doctorNo} and date_format(sdno.appoint_date,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{params.appointDate}
select * from sys_doctor_nurse_schedule where doctor_nurse_no=#{params.doctorNo} and date_from=#{params.dateFrom} and service_method=#{params.serviceMethod}
mapper.update: update sys_doctor_nurse_schedule set date_from=#{params.newDateFrom},time_from=#{params.timeFrom},time_to=#{params.timeTo},edit_time=#{params.editTime} WHERE doctor_nurse_no=#{params.doctorNo} and sys_id=#{params.sysId}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM sys_doctor_nurse_schedule where doctor_nurse_no = #{params.doctorNo} and date_format(date_from,'%Y-%m')=date_format(#{params.dateFrom},'%Y-%m') and time_from='08:00:00' and time_to='11:00:00'

SELECT count(*) FROM sys_doctor_nurse_schedule where doctor_nurse_no = #{params.doctorNo} and date_format(date_from,'%Y-%m')=date_format(#{params.dateFrom},'%Y-%m') and time_from='13:00:00' and time_to='16:00:00'
mapper.update: update sys_doctor_nurse_schedule set is_deleted=1 where sys_id=#{sysId}
